Maeve Horan-Portelance is a fourth-year undergraduate at UCLA studying Statistics and Data Science with a minor in Global Health. She is interested in data analytics across all fields, and enjoys combining her quantitative skills with her creative abilities. Maeve has extensive experience in data analysis, experimental design, data mining, statistical modeling, machine learning, R, C++, Python, SQL, and MicroStrategy, and is eager to use this knowledge in future positions.
